analytics_data_platform_deploy_descripti: OVH Analytics Data Platform contains all the tools to ingest, clean, process and visualize vast amounts data. We deploy a preconfigured and fully secured Apache Hadoop cluster, on top of OVH Public Cloud compute and storage resources. Then, simply upload your data or add data collector for real-time flows, and follow our documentation to make us of Analytics Data Platform benefits.
